derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting special affection or attachment): shortening of Old French especialte, from especial (see special)

entry.def: Someone's specialty is a particular type of work that they do most or do best, or a subject that they know a lot about.

example.ex: Both doctors and nurses have increasingly made a specialty of the care of the aged.
example.tran: 越来越多的医生和护士专门从事老年人的护理工作。

entry.def: A specialty of a particular place is a special food or product that is always very good there.

example.tran: 海鲜、西班牙肉菜饭、南美肉馅卷饼和其他特色食品

means.word_mean: 1. an asset of special worth or utility;
3. the special line of work you have adopted as your career;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,用在形容词后,表示"特性,性质等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: certain肯定的+ty特性,性质等→n.必然,肯定;必然的事
cruel残酷的+ty特性,性质等→n.残酷;残酷行为
entire全部的,完整的+ty特性,性质等→n.全部,完全

stems_affixes.value_cn: 虚弱,脆弱,意志薄弱,过失
stems_affixes.word_buile: frail脆弱的+ty特性,性质等→n.虚弱,脆弱,意志薄弱,过失

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新颖,新奇,新鲜,新奇的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: novel新奇的,新颖的+ty特性,性质等→n.新颖,新奇,新鲜,新奇的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 安全,保险;安全设备,保险装置
stems_affixes.word_buile: safe安全的+ty特性,性质等→n.安全,保险;安全设备,保险装置
special特别的+ty特性,性质等→n.专业,专长
